meanings.sent1: I love kiting on windy days at the park.
meanings.sent2: Children enjoy kiting in the open field during summer.
meanings.sent3: The colorful kite was kiting gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed as the kite was kiting high above.
meanings.sent5: The kite kiting in the clear blue sky was a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: To engage in the fraudulent practice of writing checks against a bank account with insufficient funds.
meanings.sent1: He got caught kiting checks and had to face the consequences.
meanings.sent2: Kiting checks is illegal and can lead to serious trouble.
meanings.sent3: The criminal thought he could get away with kiting checks, but justice caught up with him.
meanings.sent4: Her financial troubles led her to consider kiting checks, but she knew it was wrong.
meanings.sent5: The risk of kiting checks was not worth the temporary gain.
